visitor.description: Visa-exempt for short visits; eTA required when arriving by air.
visitor.processingTime: eTA usually instant; can take up to 72 hours.
visitor.financialRequirement: No fixed minimum; show means to cover trip duration.
visitor.notes: Stays usually up to 6 months; longer stays or work/study need appropriate permits.

student.description: Study permit required for programs longer than short-term courses.
documents: Letter of acceptance from a DLI
Proof of funds (tuition + living, per IRCC)
student.processingTime: Typical outside-Canada decision ~6‚Äì12 weeks (‚âà42‚Äì84 days); check IRCC tool for your office.
student.cost: Study permit: CAD 150; Biometrics (if required): CAD 85/person (family max CAD 170).
student.notes: TRV or eTA generally issued automatically with an approved study permit.

work.description: Work permit required (employer-specific or open, category-dependent).
work.processingTime: Typical outside-Canada range ~8‚Äì16 weeks (‚âà56‚Äì112 days); check IRCC tool.
work.cost: Work permit: CAD 155; Open work-permit holder fee (if applicable): +CAD 100; Biometrics (if required): CAD 85/person.
work.financialRequirement: Proof you can support yourself until you receive income.
work.notes: IEC and other categories have specific caps and timelines; employer steps may be required inside Canada.

visitor.description: Visa-exempt for tourism/business up to 90 days for French nationals.
visitor.cost: Free (no visa fee for visa-exempt entry).
visitor.financialRequirement: No fixed threshold; cover daily expenses.
visitor.notes: Length and activities are determined by border control at entry.

student.description: Student visa required; Certificate of Eligibility (CoE) from Japan generally required.
student.processingTime: Consulate issuance ~5 working days after acceptance; CoE issuance in Japan typically ~1‚Äì2 months.
student.cost: Visa fee varies by nationality; single-entry commonly ~JPY 3,000.
student.financialRequirement: Funds to cover tuition + living (bank statements/sponsor).

work.description: Work visa required; most categories require CoE from Japanese employer/sponsor.
work.processingTime: Consulate issuance ~5 working days; CoE issuance usually ~1‚Äì3 months.
work.cost: Visa fee varies by nationality; single-entry often ~JPY 3,000.
work.notes: Category-specific criteria (e.g., Engineer/Specialist in Humanities/International Services, Highly Skilled).

visitor.description: Temporary Resident Visa (TRV) required to visit Canada.
documents: Proof of funds and ties to Algeria
visitor.processingTime: Typical outside-Canada decision ~20‚Äì60 days; check IRCC tool for your visa office.
visitor.cost: TRV: CAD 100/person (family cap CAD 500); Biometrics: CAD 85/person (family cap CAD 170).
visitor.financialRequirement: Show funds to cover trip (often ‚âàCAD 1,000 per month of stay + travel costs).
visitor.notes: IRCC/VAC may request additional documents or an interview; medical exam may be required in some cases.

student.description: Study permit required for programs beyond short-term study.
student.processingTime: Commonly ~6‚Äì12+ weeks (‚âà42‚Äì90 days); check IRCC tool by country/office.
student.cost: Study permit: CAD 150; Biometrics (if required): CAD 85/person (family cap CAD 170).
student.financialRequirement: Funds per IRCC (tuition + living for student and any family members).
student.notes: TRV is usually issued automatically when the permit is approved for visa-required nationals.

work.description: Work permit required (employer-specific or open, depending on program).
work.processingTime: Usually ~8‚Äì16+ weeks (‚âà56‚Äì120 days) depending on category/office; check IRCC tool.
work.cost: Work permit: CAD 155; Open work-permit holder fee (if applicable): +CAD 100; Biometrics: CAD 85/person.
work.financialRequirement: Ability to support yourself until first pay; program-specific proofs may apply.
work.notes: IEC and other pathways have separate quotas and timelines.

documents: Proof of accommodation (hotel booking or invitation)
Proof of sufficient funds (bank statements, etc.)
visitor.processingTime: Standard 15 calendar days; may extend up to 45 days.
visitor.cost: Adults: ‚Ç¨90; Children 6‚Äì11: ‚Ç¨45; Under 6: free; VFS/TLS service fees may apply.
visitor.notes: Apply via France-Visas/TLS; additional documents or interview may be requested.

student.processingTime: Typically ~4‚Äì8+ weeks; may vary by season/consulate.
student.notes: Campus France procedure usually required before visa submission.

work.description: Long-stay work visa required; employer must complete work authorization steps.
work.processingTime: Several weeks to a few months depending on formalities.
work.financialRequirement: Income/means as per contract and French regulations.
work.notes: Employer in France coordinates with authorities for authorization prior to visa.

visitor.description: Visitor visa required for Algerian citizens.
visitor.processingTime: In principle ~5 working days (‚âà1 week) after application is accepted; can be longer if checks are needed.
visitor.financialRequirement: Proof of funds sufficient for stay.
visitor.notes: Apply at the Embassy of Japan in Algiers (requirements may vary).

student.processingTime: Consulate ~5 working days; CoE issuance ~1‚Äì2 months in Japan.
student.cost: Visa fee varies by nationality; single-entry around JPY 3,000.

work.processingTime: Consulate ~5 working days; CoE issuance commonly ~1‚Äì3 months.
work.cost: Visa fee varies by nationality; consulate confirms.

documents: Proof of funds & ties to Morocco

visitor.financialRequirement: Show funds for stay (often ‚âàCAD 1,000 per month + travel costs).

student.financialRequirement: Funds per IRCC for tuition & living (varies by province/family).

work.financialRequirement: Show ability to support yourself initially.

documents: Proof of funds (bank statements, employer letter, etc.)
visitor.processingTime: Decision normally within 15 calendar days; may extend to 45 days.

visitor.processingTime: In principle ~5 working days after acceptance; may be longer if checks are needed.
visitor.notes: Apply via Embassy of Japan in Rabat; additional documents may be requested.

student.processingTime: Consulate ~5 working days; CoE issuance ~1‚Äì2 months in Japan.
student.cost: Visa fee varies by nationality; single-entry ~JPY 3,000.

work.processingTime: Consulate ~5 working days; CoE ~1‚Äì3 months depending on case.

student.financialRequirement: Proof per IRCC (tuition + living; depends on province/family).

work.processingTime: Often ~8‚Äì16+ weeks (‚âà56‚Äì120 days) depending on office/category; see IRCC tool.
work.cost: Work permit: CAD 155; Open work-permit holder fee (if applicable): +CAD 100; Biometrics: CAD 85/person.

visitor.processingTime: Normally 15 calendar days; can extend to 45 days.

visitor.description: Visa-exempt for short stays (typically up to 90 days) for Tunisian passport holders.
visitor.processingTime: None (visa-exempt entry). If a visa is needed for another purpose, consulate issuance is typically ~5 working days.
visitor.financialRequirement: Funds to cover stay (no fixed threshold).
visitor.notes: Entry conditions/duration determined by border control on arrival.

student.cost: Visa fee varies by nationality; single-entry around JPY 3,000.
